meanings.definition: A person who studies hard and is diligent in their work.
meanings.sent1: Tom is a dedicated swots who always completes his assignments on time.
meanings.sent2: The swots in our class always score the highest on exams.
meanings.sent3: The swots in the library had a mountain of books to read.
meanings.sent4: She was a swots, absorbing knowledge like a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The swots' determination to succeed was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: To study intensively or for a long period of time.
meanings.sent1: I need to swots for my upcoming history test.
meanings.sent2: She swots for hours every night to prepare for the exam.
meanings.sent3: He decided to swots all weekend to catch up on his reading.
meanings.sent4: The students swots late into the night before the big presentation.
meanings.sent5: Swotsing is essential for academic success.
